name: Box Labyrinth
detailed_description: Use boxes to make bridges across the water, and keep buttons held down that open gates that block your path. In certain stages, you will need to co-operate with a partner (that you can switch to freely) to get boxes out of tight spots, hold down a button, or give you the positioning you need to solve a puzzle. Conveyor belts provide additional challenge by restricting your movement, often acting as a one-way door.
about_the_game: Use boxes to make bridges across the water, and keep buttons held down that open gates that block your path. In certain stages, you will need to co-operate with a partner (that you can switch to freely) to get boxes out of tight spots, hold down a button, or give you the positioning you need to solve a puzzle. Conveyor belts provide additional challenge by restricting your movement, often acting as a one-way door.
short_description: Solve environmental puzzles by pushing boxes around, making bridges, pushing buttons, and riding conveyor belts. In certain stages, you will be given a partner, and you can switch control between you and your partner at any time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 7
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Dual Core CPU
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 compliant graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft 64bit Windows 10
  • Processor: 64bit Intel compatible Quad Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX11 based graphics card
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
